alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sawatch Mountains above 11000 Ft; La Garita Mountains Above 10000 Ft; Saguache County West of Continental Divide Below 10000 Ft; Western Chaffee County Between 9000 and 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 28 at 2:48PM MST until March 02 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY HAS BEEN ISSUED FROM 5 AM WEDNESDAY TO 11 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Sawatch Mountains Above 11000 Feet, Western Chaffee County Between 9000 and 11000 Feet, Saguache County West of Continental Divide Below 10000 Feet and La Garita Mountains Above 10000 Feet. * WHEN...From 5 AM Wednesday to 11 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
